block.p: Carrie Frances Maynard, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Buckley A. Maynard of Glen Rock, N.J., was married yesterday to Thomas Francis Nichols Jr., the son of Mr. and Mrs. Nichols of Windermere, Fla. The Rev. Robert Gray performed the ceremony at the Winter Park (Fla.) Presbyterian Church.

Mrs. Nichols graduated from the Foxcroft School and Sweet Briar College. She is a coordinator of prime-time sales services at NBC-TV in New York, where her husband is a manager of sports sales services. Her father, who is retired, was a pilot for Exxon.
The bridegroom graduated from Syracuse University and received an M.B.A. degree from Fordham University. His father is a division manager in financial systems for A.T.&T. in Orlando, Fla.

Mrs. Nichols graduated from the Foxcroft School and Sweet Briar College. She is a coordinator of prime-time sales services at NBC-TV in New York, where her husband is a manager of sports sales services. Her father, who is retired, was a pilot for Exxon.
The bridegroom graduated from Syracuse University and received an M.B.A. degree from Fordham University. His father is a division manager in financial systems for A.T.&T. in Orlando, Fla.
